ModulePrefs.title: Youtube Video Player
ModulePrefs.description: This module stores a link to a youtube video so that it can be played from the google personalized homepage. In the future a list may be implemented.
ModulePrefs.author: Wisgary Torres
ModulePrefs.author_aboutme: I am a computer science major in the University of Puerto Rico in Bayamon. My bejeweled gadget and other game gadgets I make are actually made for my girlfriend Sarah, who is a big bejeweled and flash games fan.
ModulePrefs.author_quote: Please stop the University of Puerto Rico Bayamon Campus from giving COBOL classes! -Myself

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">
var prefs = new _IG_Prefs(__MODULE_ID__);
var videoArray = prefs.getArray("playList");
var playRand = prefs.getBool("randomness");
var randVidIndex = Math.floor(Math.random()*videoArray.length);

var url;

if (playRand)
	url = videoArray[randVidIndex];
else
	url = prefs.getString("vlink");


var vcode = url.substring(url.indexOf("=")+1, url.indexOf("=")+12);


var fullStr = '<object width="287" height="237"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/' + vcode + '"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/' + vcode + '" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="287" height="237"></embed></object>'
document.write(fullStr);
</script>
